thread.title: Lauderdale County coroner IDs intruder shot by homeowner
thread.title_full: Lauderdale County coroner IDs intruder shot by homeowner - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Lauderdale County coroner IDs intruder shot by homeowner
text:
MERIDIAN, Miss. (AP) - The man who police say was fatally shot when he broke into a woman's house early Sunday morning has been identified.
Lauderdale County Coroner Clayton Cobler tells The Meridian Star ( http://bit.ly/1OKj2FY ) fingerprints positively identified the man as James Cole Jr.
Cobler says Cole was shot three times in the chest with a .380 caliber revolver.
Detective Dareall Thompson says the woman was upstairs in her two-story home when she looked downstairs and saw the man in her living room. He says the woman came down the stairs and shot the intruder.
Thompson says Cole made it out of the front door and collapsed.
He says the homeowner will face a grand jury but it will likely be determined she acted within her legal rights.
Information from: The Meridian Star, http://www.meridianstar.com
